```{r}
library(ggmap)

library(dplyr)
library(rvest)
states <- map_data("state")
```

```{r}
url <- "https://inkplant.com/code/state-latitudes-longitudes"
state_center <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_node(xpath = '//*[@id="main_content_div"]/table') %>%
  html_table()

my_names <- state_center[1,]

colnames(state_center) <- my_names
state_center <- state_center %>%
  filter(State != "State")
```
